segments.text: Sorry to have smoked in your room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . I ’ ll open the window .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Smoking is harmful for your health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I ’ ll try to give it up .
segments.speaker: S1
